quote: If you are unable to find the truth right where you are, where else do you expect to find it? – Dogen
fact: The flea can jump 350 times its body length. It's like a human jumping the length of a football field.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: A quick shoutout to all of the sidewalks out there... Thanks for keeping me off the streets.
